thread.title: Cavaliers, Tristan Thompson Reach Agreement on Five-Year Deal
thread.title_full: Cavaliers, Tristan Thompson Reach Agreement on Five-Year Deal

author: Louis Milman
title: Cavaliers, Tristan Thompson Reach Agreement on Five-Year Deal
text:
Share Article 
Photo by Gregory Shamus/Getty Images (CLEVELAND) -- Just about a week ahead of the regular season opener, the Cleveland Cavaliers and forward Tristan Thompson agreed to a five-year contract.ESPN reports that the deal is worth $82 million and is fully guaranteed. Thompson had been a restricted free agent this past offseason, but had held out of team activities because he and the Cavaliers could not reach a contract agreement.The Cavaliers open their season on Oct. 27 against the Chicago Bulls.
